thread.title: Bikinis, beaches and boats: How stars are braving the heatwave
thread.title_full: Bikinis, beaches and boats: How stars are braving the heatwave | DailyTelegraph

author: Network Vision
title: Bikinis, beaches and boats: How stars are braving the heatwave
text:
SPRING has put on an epic show, giving us a taste of the long summer days ahead.
While you were soaking up the final few hours of the long weekend, likewise were the stars and sharing it all on Instagram. As the sunshine rolls on and the three-day fun comes to an end, relive the happy memories through the best pictures on social media.
Natasha Oakley “Fun way to end the long weekend... Stand up, sit down, fall off!” - Jennifer Hawkins
Jennifer Hawkins “The MacPhersons went boating... First day off in a long time. Family, Sunshine, saltwater and cold beer... perfection” - Daniel Macpherson
Daniel Macpherson Olympia Valance Lisa & David Campbell Rachael Finch “First swim of the season... not exactly the beach but still so good” - Sally Obermeder
Sally Obermeder Sylvia Jeffreys & Peter Stefanovic “There’s no where else I’d rather be! Australia” - Lisa Hyde

Rendezview 0 comments Terror raids over Sydney shooting Crime School prayers are in the spotlight Nsw ‘Let the blood flow on the street’ Nsw ‘Her boyfriend was already engaged’ Relationships Lisa Hyde Anna Heinrich & Tim Robards “You know summer is here when you bust open a splice... iceblock weather makes me happy!” - Nikki Phillips
Nikki Phillips Jye Emdur “These two are the best of friends. Fun day at the beach for our little family. We have a water baby on our hands.” - Candice Warner
Candice & David Warner Elyse Knowlzy Jade Albany “To all my Irish friends back home Spring in Sydney has arrived 33deg” - Colin Fassnidge
Colin Fassnidge Jay Lyon “Diving into the long weekend #bottomsup” - Laura Csortan
